articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: As the Israel-Hamas war continues into a third week, doctors in Gaza battle to save who they can.
articles.title: Dead and wounded strain Gaza hospitals as air strikes intensify

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Partial results from Sunday's election suggest the country will have to vote again next month.
articles.title: Argentina presidential election: Javier Milei and Sergio Massa head for run-off vote

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Activists say morality police assaulted her for not wearing a hijab, but officials say she fainted.
articles.title: Iran hijab police accused of beating girl into coma

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: As the war between Israel and Hamas intensifies, so have attacks against both communities in the US.
articles.title: American Jews and Palestinians face fear and hatred

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.description: Max Verstappen climbs up from sixth on the grid to win the US Grand Prix after a close battle with Lando Norris and Lewis Hamilton.
articles.title: Verstappen wins US GP ahead of charging Hamilton

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Samantha Woll's body was found in a city park not far from her home with stab wounds.
articles.title: Detroit synagogue president Samantha Woll found murdered

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Thrills and spills as kayakers use pumpkin power in an annual competition near Antwerp.
articles.title: Belgians race boats made of giant pumpkins

articles.description: The Israeli military says space under a mosque was being used by Hamas to prepare "imminent" attacks.
articles.title: Israel carries out air strike on West Bank city Jenin

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: In an exclusive interview, Dr Mohamed Muizzu tells the BBC he wants all Indian troops removed.
articles.title: Mohamed Muizzu: The Maldives' new president wants India out

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Chinese state media reports some of the Taiwan-based firm's mainland operations are being investigated.
articles.title: Foxconn: iPhone-maker investigated by Chinese authorities
